DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate effect change insulin level brain activity . Participants complete functional magnetic resonance imaging ( fMRI ) scan fasting condition , insulin infusion .
DOC.brief_title: Insulin Modulation fMRI Connectivity Healthy Adults
DOC.detailed_description: Insulin hormone release pancreas response increase glucose level result food intake . In addition stimulate glucose uptake periphery , insulin signal central nervous system induce satiety inhibit feed behavior . To begin identify specific effect circulate insulin brain network , current study recruit healthy participant undergo two functional magnetic resonance imaging scan . One scan perform fasted state , alternate scan conduct isoglycemic hyperinsulinemic clamp . This project allow u identify specific effect circulate insulin brain reactivity palatable food .
DOC.criteria: Body mass index 18 24 HOMAIR < 1.55 ( homeostatic model assessment insulin resistance ( ( glucose x insulin ) / 405 ) ) . Current lifetime history cardiovascular disease surgery ( include hypertension , stroke , myocardial infarction , congestive heart failure , atrial ventricular arrhythmia , coronary bypass , carotid artery , peripheral vascular surgery ) Current lifetime history cancer , chronic kidney liver condition , type I II diabetes , pulmonary respiratory disease Current lifetime diagnosis substance abuse Positive urine drug screen Current lifetime use glucocorticoid medication > 1 month A previous cerebrovascular accident trauma involve loss consciousness Previous neurosurgery history neurological condition Pregnancy ( female ) Claustrophobia Ferrous metallic implant surgically place medical device clear safety 3Tesla MRI strength Peripheral vascular disease Liver , kidney , active blood disease Peripheral neuropathy Anemia ( hematocrit < 34 % ) Inability and/or willingness comply protocol write Fasting glucose > 126 mg/dL Currently take blood thinner coumadin , Lovenox , etc . Currently take medication alter glucose homeostasis ( steroid , glucocorticoid , nicotinic acid ) Current use psychotropic medication ( SSRI , SNRI , etc . ) Currently take thiazolidinediones insulin Currently use statin antihypertensive medication Use medication related HIV affect insulin sensitivity . We NOT specifically test HIV serostatus . Females currently hormone replacement therapy ( HRT ) less 6 month Participants instruct abstain eating , drinking ( water ) , smoke exercise 12 hour prior study visit . Being leave hand Body mass index 24 18 Milk allergy / lactose intolerance Polycystic ovary syndrome
